name: SURVIVAL MODE 2
description:
Hi. This is the sequel to SURVIVAL MODE. this is a top down shooter where you play as a turret and shoot hordes of undead and try to survive for as long as possible!. SURVIVAL MODE 2  features 2 AI controlled turrets to help you and a barricade to protect you. The barricade can only be broken through by BOSSES . And the game features a full Day/Night cycle that really brings it to life. At night it starts raining and lightning kills enemies if struck!. I really hope you enjoy my game!

This game is completely free but any donations will be very much appreciated and will help me to create bigger and better games in the future!.
